segments.text: Greg . I want to speak to you for a minute .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Ms . Gray . Is there something wrong ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m afraid there is , Greg . I don ’ t mind you taking a break . But you ’ Ve been away from your desk for twenty-five minutes already .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry , Ms . Gray . I must have lost track of the time . I ’ ll get back to work , now .
segments.speaker: S2
